title: The Summer Garden: A Retelling of Beauty and the Beast
description: This is a short read, a novelette of approximately 11,000 words. In a land where it is always winter lives a beast who was once a man and who--if legend is to be believed--might be a man again if love can conquer all, and the magic of the summer garden can bring love to him. Kat Parrish, author of BRIDE OF THE MIDNIGHT KING, has re-imagined the classic tale of Beauty and the Beast using Eastern European folklore and her ow fairy tale spin.
author: Kat Parrish
